# XclearAI - AI Automation for Small Business

> XclearAI deploys intelligent AI assistants for small businesses in Utah and nationwide. We automate email management, scheduling, customer support, and repetitive tasks so business owners can focus on growth.

## Company Overview

- **Name:** XclearAI
- **Location:** Utah, USA
- **Phone:** (385) 336-6005
- **Email:** info@xclearai.com
- **Website:** https://xclearai.com

## What We Do

XclearAI provides AI automation services for small businesses. We deploy custom AI assistants that handle:

1. **Email Management** - Inbox triage, prioritization, automated responses
2. **Scheduling & Booking** - 24/7 appointment scheduling without phone tag
3. **Customer Support** - AI chatbots that answer FAQs instantly
4. **Document Processing** - Forms, intake, data entry automation
5. **Follow-up Automation** - Never miss a lead or deadline
6. **CRM Integration** - Keep systems synced and data current

## Industries We Serve

- Law Firms
- Real Estate Agencies
- Medical & Dental Practices
- Accounting Firms
- Contractors & Home Services
- Insurance Agencies
- Consulting Firms
- Property Management Companies

## How It Works

1. **Discovery Call** - 30-minute consultation to understand your workflows
2. **Custom Setup** - We configure AI with your tools, voice, and processes
3. **Go Live** - Your AI starts working; we monitor and optimize continuously

## Why Choose XclearAI

- Utah-based company with local support
- Custom AI solutions (not one-size-fits-all)
- Quick deployment (days, not months)
- Ongoing optimization and support
- Focus on small business needs and budgets
